content.prompt: Which of the following claims does Toscanelli make about China in the passage?

choices.label: It was a source of valuable trading commodities.
Only Portugal was in a good position to access its wealth.
Its inhabitants were eager to trade with Europe.
It could not be reached by sailing around Africa.

topic.text: 1.6: Technological Advances and the Age of Exploration

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
